description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Microsoft Message Queuing (MSMQ) elevation of privilege vulnerability associated with CVE-2024-21354, it is essential to apply the relevant security updates:

1. Identify your system architecture and Windows version from the build numbers.
2. Download the appropriate KB update from the Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
3. Follow the instructions detailed in the KB articles for installation.
4. Restart your system if prompted to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This patch addresses a critical heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability that could allow elevation of privilege. It is imperative to keep the systems updated to prevent exploitation.
- Ensure that the system is backed up before applying updates to avoid potential data loss.
